data.title: Famous Birthdays on August 4
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 4th of August. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on August 4.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 226

Richard de Clare, 6th Earl of Hertford, English soldier (d. 1262)

Külüg Khan, Chinese Prince of Huaining, 3rd Emperor of the Yuan Dynasty, born in Khanbaliq, Yuan China (d. 1311)

Duke Leopold I of Austria (d. 1326)

Pieter Coecke van Aelst, Flemish artist, architect and designer of tapestries and stained glass (court painter to Holy Roman Emperor Charles V), born in Aelst (d. 1550)

Pope Urban VII (d. 1590)

François Hédelin, abbé d'Aubignac, French writer, born in Paris (d. 1676)

Louis Lully, French musician and son of Jean-Baptiste Lully, born in Paris, France (d. 1734)

Thomas Blackwell, Scottish classical scholar, born in Aberdeen, Scotland (d. 1757)
